channel.title: comedy on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in comedy on Barefoot Rob

item.title: I performed stand up comedy!
item.description: (adapted from my note last night to Mark) I went to a stand-up comedy open mic tonight and ended up doing a set (my first ever!) Several jokes went well, a couple did not; one of those is not recoverable in any way I can think of. Soness said it was really good that I used contents of the room for several of my bits.

item.title: A Dog's Purpose
item.description: 11:36 Monday 09 October 2017 JST Lin likes dogs, so I plan to preview this movie to see if she’d like it. 11:41 Monday 09 October 2017 JST Just for the record, there were approximately 5 minutes of ads before the movie started after I pressed play. 11:58 Monday 09 October 2017 JST I turned it off. Bailey was poorly trained.
